message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $8,000. Would you consider reducing the price?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $14,000 is already a very competitive price for this product. Could you meet me halfway at $11,000?
I appreciate your response, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to meet at $11,000. Could we perhaps agree on $9,500?
